title: US senator asks judges if they used AI in withdrawn court rulings
description: U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Chuck Grassley on Monday asked two federal judges to answer questions about whether artificial intelligence was used to prepare recent orders that contained "substantive errors".
content:
Oct 6 (Reuters) - U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Chuck Grassley on Monday asked two federal judges to answer questions about whether artificial intelligence was used to prepare recent orders that contained "substantive errors".

title: The Singularity Myth: Unpacking AI's Future
description: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, has repeatedly shifted his predictions for achieving Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), while critics argue that current large language models are inherently limited and will never reach true AGI.
content: Sam Altman is the CEO of the most visible artificial intelligence (AI) organization on the planet, OpenAI, the purveyors of the popular ChatGPT AI interface. His job is to keep the investment dollars flowing into OpenAI, tens of billions of them. So,... [9585 chars]

title: OpenAI’s Golden Touch Spreads as Stocks Soar Off Mere Mentions
description: OpenAI has already proved it has a golden touch when it comes to partnering with other tech firms to deploy its artificial intelligence products. Its power to move shares, though, is rapidly spreading to companies it even briefly discusses teaming up with.

title: FTA with Qatar to be finalised by mid-2026: Goyal
description: In his statement, Piyush Goyal highlighted opportunities in agriculture and food products. He also pointed to emerging areas of collaboration including renewable energy, data centres, artificial intelligence, tourism, pharmaceuticals and cosmetics.
content:
India and Qatar will soon launch negotiations on a free trade agreement (FTA), with the goal of reaching a deal by the middle or third quarter of next year, commerce and industry minister Piyush Goyal said in Doha on Monday.

title: Mattel partners with OpenAI on Sora 2 AI video model
description: Toymaker Mattel is partnering with OpenAI to test the ChatGPT maker's artificial-intelligence video model Sora 2, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said at the company's Developer Day conference on Monday.

title: Music publishers fend off Anthropic's bid to dismiss some AI copyright claims
description: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic lost a bid on Monday to dismiss parts of a copyright infringement lawsuit brought by music publishers over Anthropic's alleged misuse of their song lyrics in its AI training.
content:
Oct 6 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence company Anthropic lost a bid on Monday to dismiss parts of a copyright infringement lawsuit brought by music publishers over Anthropic's alleged misuse of their song lyrics in its AI training.
